subject: Pedal adjustability
description_text:
Hi there,
Im interested in Plus X pedals. But I was wondering whats the adjustability
range in brake pedal? Im a woman and I dont really have much strenght but I
also want to feel the brakes.
For reference Im now using the Moza SR-P Lite and with the brake kit Its
too stiff for me, and without it its soft and I have no feeling.
I just want to make sure I will be able to set it to fit me before purchase.

Best regards :)

conversations.body_text: Hi Kinga Łączna,     No need to worry—you can calibrate the software by setting 100% to match your maximum pedal force. Alternatively, you can purchase a set of white 30HA soft elastomer pads to increase your available brake pedal travel.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/elastomer
